name: LastBeat
description: LastBeat is a 2d rhythm platformer game developed by Bamboo21 Studio. It is set in abstract dimension (other dimension) where an object has been switch into geometric-pattern, and the player must navigate through weird obstacles while following the rhythm. During the game, the player will encounter portal and rhythm music, each with their own unique characteristics and with different rhythm, and player must survive until the end in a abstract dimension.
